name: The Mystery of Selenite
description:
In this game, a young lunar dweller comes into contact with NASA astronauts. He does not have a clear plan of action, he solves problems on the go. But he strives so hard to do something significant, something unimaginable for his Moon, that on his way he is not afraid of any obstacles.

This game was made for "Game Off 2020" in about 20 days. As part of the project, all 3d objects were made, including the environment and characters, and 95 percent of the code was written from scratch.

If we talk about the topic of Game Jam, then I wanted to look at the arrival of astronauts on the moon through the eyes of the inhabitants of the moon.
